channel.title: Spring break
channel.description: Tell me what your doing this spring break. How is it going so far. Im just skating and stuff, being bored.

k so lets do this.

I got took my helicopter to Orland on Wednesday[/quote] I think you said that wrong, but that sounds like alot of fun compaired to my spring break, mostly skating and other stupid shit like driving around and yelling at people. I went to school today, GAY GAY GAY! lol

I’m chilling with my girlfriend for my whole Spring Break. I’ll even be sleeping at her house and such.[/quote]

item.title: Spring break
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

k so lets do this.

I got took my helicopter to Orland on Wednesday, arrives at the Resort.
The wireless was shit there, so I walked around for most of the day, went to the pool, and went to some pizza place.

On Thursday I went to a new hotel, the Nikoloden Hotel, has some fun pools so I went on the slides and stuff, had a food court so I stuffed my face, had a lake with a swan who would not wake up for shit[Through so much shit at it lol] and a big arcade, I found out that you need to swipe your card after the game to get tickets and most people don’t do this so I went around getting 6k+ tickets, until a worker told me to leave and took my card

On Friday I went to Disney World, then Universal studios, at around 12:00 that night a room a few rooms away from me caught fire, fire fighters came put it out. 12:30 alarms go off again, the alarms went off a total of 5 times.

Saturday I came home, brought my TV to Trevors and played xbox most of the day.

Well dats it I guess, I still have this week off.

O yeah, I met Aly and Aj lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Spring break
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

Those people are adults. Age limit doesn’t apply to them. Now if I was 17 and she was 14, that’d be pushing it a little far. If teenagers are going to go out, it’s better if there’s a maximum 2 years age difference.

Her parents flipped when I asked if I could go out with her, mainly because of my age. Now, because of of perves out there, people now think older yeenage guys just go out with girls around 14 just for sex and nothing else. But I’m not like that, and I had to prove that to her parents. Me and her have been going out for a month now, and we’re starting to get pretty intense when we do have those intiment moments, so sex shoulnd’t be far off, maybe 2 months at the most. Me and her are cool like that, because if it does hapen, it happens.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 20, 2008, 06:56:36 AM[/size][hr]My mom’s freaking out too. My girlfriend loves the fact that I work out and have a decent body and stuff. I mentioned the she was playing around with me yesterday and punching my abs, my mom was like “She can like your body, but she can’t do anything with it”, so I’m like “shut up”. I’d let my girlfriend do anything to me that she wanted as long as it veers away from kinky shit…I can’t stand kinky people…Goddamn leather straps.

Read full topic

SOMEONE IS DATING SOMEONE A WHOLE YEAR YOUNGER THAN THEM?

STOP THE PRESSES, I BET HES A PAEDOPHILE!

EDIT: My bad, I thought he was a 9th grader. Still, it’s hardly massive.[/quote]

There is a difference in the maturity level for her. She acts like an adult, just as I do most of the time. I wouldn’t be going out with her if she was some jumpy girl, although she is pretty playful sometimes.

item.title: Spring break
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Chimaera God:

My spring break doesn’t start until the 27th… But when that day does come around, I’m going to this awesome party at my girlfriend’s house. There’s gonna be 100 people there: 70 girls, 30 guys. Only the guys my girlfriend knows are getting in the house, and since I’m going out with her, I’m going to the most important person there besides her. I’ll be the oldest there too, since my girlfriend is in 8th grade. I’ll pretty much be the V.I.P. of the night. And she’s only throwing the party do all her friends can finally meet her awesome boyfriend…

Oh yea,sounds like a blast!Won’t you be Mr.Cool,all those grade eighter’s might look up to you.I so wish I was you,dating a grade eighter.

Read full topic
